ore_index_format: This is the $(thing)Ore Index$() of every $(item)Ore$() on $(thing){0}$(), sorted alphabetically and then by richest to poorest vein type.
vein_index_format: This is the $(thing)Vein Index$() for $(item){0}$(). Each Vein has details regarding its rarity, density, vein type, height found, sizes, what stones it spawns in, and more.
